name: 5 Cards No Fingers
description:
Hello, I'm Andrei, and I am a 17 -year-old student who is passionate about game development!  5 Cards No Fingers is a short, story-driven experience that merges platforming and card games. This is my first time publishing one of my projects and I am really proud of it. Thanks to the following people for their amazing artwork:

-Jesse Munguia

-Warren Clark

-ansimuz

-edermunizz

-Sven T.

Thanks to the following for their amazing music:

-The Enigma TNG

-CO.AG Music
